trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> that processes security tokens of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" />类型的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 进程安全标志。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler> class serializes, deserializes, and validates session tokens.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>类序列化、 反序列化，并验证会话令牌。

trans-unit.source: Session tokens are tokens of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: 会话令牌是令牌的类型<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler> class serializes the tokens to and from cookie format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>类序列化和 cookie 格式的令牌。

trans-unit.source: By default, the class serializes tokens into WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，类将序列化令牌到 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 或 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3`<wsc:SecurityContextToken>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Session tokens are used by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> (WSFAM) and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> (SAM) to store information about a session, this is primarily the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal> associated with the authenticated user and the session start and expiration times.
trans-unit.target: 可使用会话令牌<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>(WSFAM) 和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>(SAM) 来存储有关会话的信息这主要是<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>与经过身份验证的用户和会话开始和过期时间。

trans-unit.source: In passive scenarios, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> calls into the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> (SAM) from the authentication pipeline to create a session token from the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal> that represents the authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: 在被动的情况下，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>调入<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>(SAM) 创建的会话令牌身份验证管道从<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>表示经过身份验证的用户。

trans-unit.source: The SAM uses its configured <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler> to create the token and to serialize it into a cookie (and to deserialize the token from a cookie on subsequent requests).
trans-unit.target: SAM 使用其配置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>以创建令牌并将其序列化到 cookie （和进行反序列化中的后续请求的 cookie 的令牌）。

trans-unit.source: The SAM uses an instance of its configured <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> class to write the cookie back to the HTTP Response.
trans-unit.target: SAM 使用其配置是实例<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>类将写回到 HTTP 响应的 cookie。

trans-unit.source: This cookie is then returned to the client and on subsequent requests the client can present the cookie rather than making a round trip back to the identity provider to re-obtain a security token.
trans-unit.target: 此 cookie 然后返回到客户端，客户端可以在后续请求显示 cookie，而不是回要重新获取安全令牌的标识提供程序进行的往返过程。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how sessions operate with WIF, see [WIF Session Management](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关会话使用 WIF 的运作方式的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 会话管理](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md)。

trans-unit.source: The \<securityTokenHandlers> configuration element can be used to specify a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler> that has the responsibility for securing the application’s sessions.
trans-unit.target: \<SecurityTokenHandlers > 配置元素可以用于指定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>，其保护应用程序的会话的责任。

trans-unit.source: Developers should use caution when changing this configuration setting, as a misconfigured system could result in application compromise.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员应格外小心时更改此配置设置，因为配置错误的系统可能会导致应用程序被破坏。

trans-unit.source: For example, specifying a derived HYPERLINK "http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh193426%28v=vs.110%29.aspx" \t "_blank" <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler> and passing an empty Transforms (CookieTransform) collection to the base, would result in the users identity being serialized into a cookie that was not protected.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果指定派生的超链接"http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh193426%28v=vs.110%29.aspx"\t"_blank"<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>和将一个空的转换 (CookieTransform) 集合传递给基，则将导致正在序列化到 cookie 未受保护的用户标识。

trans-unit.source: This could allow an attacker to modify the identity and therefore change access privileges.
trans-unit.target: 这可能允许攻击者可以修改的标识，并因此更改访问权限。

trans-unit.source: If the session token is in reference mode, that is, its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `true`, the session token handler only serializes properties of the session token that are needed to regenerate its key in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache>.
trans-unit.target: 如果会话令牌是在引用模式下，即其<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是`true`、 令牌处理程序只序列化所需重新生成中的其键的属性的会话令牌的会话<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache>。

trans-unit.source: In the default case, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCacheKey> class is used to represent cache keys, and the token handler writes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ContextId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyGeneration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties of the token.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCacheKey>类用于表示缓存密钥，并标记处理程序将写入<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ContextId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyGeneration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的令牌属性。

trans-unit.source: If the session token is not in reference mode, that is, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `false`, then, in addition to the properties mentioned previously, the handler invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A> method on a byte array serialized from the token and stores the resulting value in the cookie as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果会话令牌未处于引用模式，即<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是`false`，然后，除了前面提到的属性，该处理程序调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A>上序列化的令牌和存储的字节数组的方法在 cookie 以及中生成的值。

trans-unit.source: For more details about how the token is serialized, see the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何对令牌进行序列化的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A> property gets the list of transforms that are applied to the session token in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A>属性获取的适用于会话的转换列表令牌<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: All transforms derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.CookieTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: 在所有转换都派生自<xref:System.IdentityModel.CookieTransform>类。

trans-unit.source: In the default case the <xref:System.IdentityModel.DeflateCookieTransform> and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.ProtectedDataCookieTransform> are applied.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下<xref:System.IdentityModel.DeflateCookieTransform>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.ProtectedDataCookieTransform>应用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.ProtectedDataCookieTransform> uses the Data Protection API (DPAPI) to protect the cookie material.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.ProtectedDataCookieTransform>使用数据保护 API (DPAPI) 来保护 cookie 材料。

trans-unit.source: DPAPI uses a key that is specific to the computer on which it is running in its protection algorithms.
trans-unit.target: DPAPI 使用特定于在其它正在运行其保护算法中的计算机的密钥。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the default session token handler is not usable in Web farm scenarios because, in such scenarios, tokens written on one computer may need to be read on another computer.
trans-unit.target: 出于此原因，默认会话令牌处理程序不适合在 Web 场方案中因为，在这种情况下，令牌编写一台计算机上可能需要在另一台计算机上读取。

trans-unit.source: You can use many strategies to circumvent this issue.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用许多策略若要避免此问题。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can:
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以：

trans-unit.source: Replace the default <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler> with the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Tokens.MachineKeySessionSecurityTokenHandler>.
trans-unit.target: 将默认替换<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>与<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Tokens.MachineKeySessionSecurityTokenHandler>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Tokens.MachineKeySessionSecurityTokenHandler> enables you to specify signing and encryption keys under the ASP.NET `<machineKey>` element in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Tokens.MachineKeySessionSecurityTokenHandler>使您能够指定在 ASP.NET 下的签名和加密密钥`<machineKey>`配置文件中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Provide a handler for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType> event in the global.asax.cs file and replace the default session token handler with an instance of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler> that has a list of transforms that includes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.RsaSignatureCookieTransform> and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的处理程序<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType>global.asax.cs 文件和替换默认的会话中的事件标记处理程序的实例替换<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>已转换的列表，其中包括<xref:System.IdentityModel.RsaSignatureCookieTransform>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform>。

trans-unit.source: You can create the new instance by invoking one of the constructors that takes a list of transforms.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用的转换列表的构造函数之一创建的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Derive a custom transform from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.CookieTransform> base class and use the method above to include it in the list of transforms to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 派生一个自定义转换从<xref:System.IdentityModel.CookieTransform>基本类和使用上面的方法来将其包含在转换要应用的列表。

trans-unit.source: Derive a custom token handler from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler> and implement your own mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 派生的自定义令牌处理程序从<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>和实现你自己的机制。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using sessions in Web farm scenarios, see [WIF and Web Farms](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关在 Web 场方案中使用会话的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 和 Web 场](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler> is included in the default token handler collection; however, you can replace it with a custom session token handler by first specifying a [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md) element under the [<securityTokenHandlers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md) element to remove the default handler from the collection and then adding your custom token handler using the [<add>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md) element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>纳入的默认令牌处理程序集合; 但是，你可以将其替换的自定义会话令牌处理程序通过第一个指定[<删除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md)元素下[ <securityTokenHandlers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md)元素从集合，然后添加你自定义令牌处理程序使用默认处理程序移除[<添加>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md)元素。

trans-unit.source: By default, you can specify the default token lifetime by including the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element under the `<add>` element.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，你可以通过包含指定的默认令牌生存期[ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)元素下的`<add>`元素。

trans-unit.source: You can design a custom token handler to take custom configuration elements under the `<add>` element by overriding the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A> method to provide the logic to process them.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设计才能下的自定义配置元素的自定义令牌处理程序`<add>`通过重写元素<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A>方法以提供逻辑来处理它们。

trans-unit.source: The following XML shows how to replace the default session security token handler in a token handler collection with an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Tokens.MachineKeySessionSecurityTokenHandler> class in configuration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 XML 演示如何使用的实例替换标记处理程序集合中的默认会话安全令牌处理<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Tokens.MachineKeySessionSecurityTokenHandler>配置中的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler" /> class that uses the default cookie transforms and token lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 初始化使用默认 Cookie 转换和令牌生存期的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A> properties are initialized to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultCookieTransforms>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A>属性初始化为<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultCookieTransforms>。

trans-unit.source: The transforms to apply when encoding or decoding the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 要在编码或解码 Cookie 时应用的转换。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler" /> class that uses the specified cookie transforms.
trans-unit.target: 初始化使用指定的 cookie 转换 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime>.
trans-unit.target: 将 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A> 属性初始化为 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="transforms" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transforms" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The transforms to apply when encoding or decoding the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 要在编码或解码 Cookie 时应用的转换。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The default lifetime for a token.
trans-unit.target: 标牌的默认生存期。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler" /> class that uses the specified cookie transforms and token lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 初始化使用指定 Cookie 转换和令牌生存期的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="transforms" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transforms" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="tokenLifetime" /> is less than or equal to <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tokenLifetime" /> 小于或等于 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: The cookie that will be transformed.
trans-unit.target: 将转换的 cookie。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cookie should be encoded; <see langword="false" /> if the cookie should be decoded.
trans-unit.target: 如果应编码 cookie，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果应解码 cookie，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies the transforms specified by the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms" /> property to either encode or decode the specified cookie.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms" /> 属性指定的转换应用于对指定 Cookie 进行编码或解码。

trans-unit.source: The encoded or decoded cookie.
trans-unit.target: 编码或解码的 cookie。

trans-unit.source: When encoding a cookie transforms are applied in the order in which they appear in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当编码 cookie 转换中出现的顺序应用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When decoding a cookie, they are applied in the reverse order.
trans-unit.target: 如果解码 cookie，则会按相反的顺序进行应用。

trans-unit.source: Called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A> methods to encode and decode the cookie material.
trans-unit.target: 从调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A>方法进行编码和解码 cookie 材料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms" /> 属性为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> over the incoming <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 上传入 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: The reader should be positioned at a <see langword="<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 读取器应定位在 <see langword="<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the reader is positioned at a <see langword="<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示读取器是否放置于 <see langword="<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" /> 元素处。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the reader points to a <see langword="<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" /> element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该读取器指向 <see langword="true" /> 元素，则为 <see langword="<wsc:SecurityContextToken>" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this handler supports validation of tokens of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此处理程序是否支持对 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 类型的标记进行验证。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handler supports validation of tokens of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该处理器支持类型 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 标记的验证，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 总是为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this handler can write tokens of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示此处理程序能否写入 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 类型的标记的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handler can write tokens of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果处理程序现在可以写入类型 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 的标记，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 总是为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name for the cookie element.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Cookie 元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name for the cookie element.
trans-unit.target: Cookie 元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default element name is "Cookie".
trans-unit.target: 默认值元素名称是"Cookie"。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A> methods to determine the element under which the encoded token material should be written or read.
trans-unit.target: 在使用此属性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A>方法，以确定在其下编码令牌材料应写入或读取的元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace for the cookie element.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Cookie 元素的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The namespace for the cookie element.
trans-unit.target: Cookie 元素的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The default namespace is "http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2006/05/security".
trans-unit.target: 默认命名空间"http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2006/05/security"。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A> methods to determine the namespace of the element under which the encoded token material should be written or read.
trans-unit.target: 在使用此属性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%2A>方法，以确定在其下编码令牌材料应写入或读取的元素的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The claims principal.
trans-unit.target: 声明主体。

trans-unit.source: A caller-defined context string.
trans-unit.target: 调用方定义的上下文字符串。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the endpoint to which the token is scoped.
trans-unit.target: 限定标识范围的终点的标示符。

trans-unit.source: The time instant at which the token becomes valid.
trans-unit.target: 标记变为有效的时间时刻。

trans-unit.source: The time instant after which the token is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 其后时间不再有效的时间时刻。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> based on the specified claims principal and time range during which the token is valid.
trans-unit.target: 创建基于指定声明主体和时间范围（在此时间范围内标记有效）的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 。

trans-unit.source: The session security token that was created.
trans-unit.target: 生成的会话安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The properties on the new session token are set according to the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 将根据指定的参数设置新会话令牌上的属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="principal" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="principal" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> 属性为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The token descriptor from which to create the token.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建标记的标记说明符。

trans-unit.source: Creates a security token based on the specified token descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 创建基于指定标记描述符的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The security token that was created.
trans-unit.target: 创建的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: This will be an instance of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 这将是 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a session security token by using the following properties in the token descriptor: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Lifetime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回会话安全令牌的令牌描述符中使用以下属性： <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Lifetime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.SaveBootstrapContext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set `true` on the token handler configuration specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A> property, the bootstrap context is created from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Token%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property and is saved in the session token.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.SaveBootstrapContext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置`true`上指定的令牌处理程序配置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A>属性，从创建的启动上下文<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Token%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，保存在会话令牌。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="tokenDescriptor" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tokenDescriptor" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> 属性为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A read only collection that contains the list of default transforms to be applied to cookies, the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.DeflateCookieTransform" /> and the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.ProtectedDataCookieTransform" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个只读集合，它包含要应用于 Cookie（<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.DeflateCookieTransform" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.ProtectedDataCookieTransform" />）的默认转换的列表。

trans-unit.source: A constant that specifies the default lifetime for cookies, ten hours.
trans-unit.target: 一个常量，它指定 Cookie 的默认生存期为 10 小时。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default token lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 获取默认的令牌生存期。

trans-unit.source: The default token lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 默认的令牌生存期。

trans-unit.source: Always <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime" />.
trans-unit.target: 总是为 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the token type URIs for the token types that can be processed by this handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取由处理程序处理的标记类型的标记标识符 URI。

trans-unit.source: The token type identifier URIs for token types that can be processed by this handler.
trans-unit.target: 由处理程序处理的标记类型的标识符 URI。

trans-unit.source: The following type URIs are supported: "http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2006/05/servicemodel/tokens/SecureConversation", "http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-secureconversation/200512/sct", and "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/sc/sct".
trans-unit.target: 支持以下类型 Uri:"http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2006/05/servicemodel/tokens/SecureConversation"，"http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-secureconversation/200512/sct"，和"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/sc/sct"。

trans-unit.source: The custom configuration elements.
trans-unit.target: 自定义配置元素。

trans-unit.source: Loads custom configuration from XML.
trans-unit.target: 从 XML 加载自定义的配置。

trans-unit.source: Called by the configuration infrastructure to initialize the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler> instance.
trans-unit.target: 配置基础结构初始化调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A> property from the `lifetime` attribute of the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A>属性从`lifetime`属性[ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)配置文件中的元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="customConfigElements" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="customConfigElements" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The configuration specified by <paramref name="customConfigElements" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="customConfigElements" /> 指定的配置无效。

trans-unit.source: For example, it does not contain a <see langword="<sessionTokenRequirement>" /> element, it contains more than one <see langword="<sessionTokenRequirement>" /> element, a valid <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value cannot be read from the <see langword="lifetime" /> attribute, or the <see langword="lifetime" /> attribute specifies a value that is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它不包含 <see langword="<sessionTokenRequirement>" /> 元素，而包含多个 <see langword="<sessionTokenRequirement>" /> 元素，不能从 <see langword="lifetime" /> 特性中读取有效 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值，否则 <see langword="lifetime" /> 特性将指定小于 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Reads a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 读取 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation deserializes the token from either a WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` element.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现进行反序列化从 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 或 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3 令牌`<wsc:SecurityContextToken>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> over the incoming <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 上传入 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: Reads the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> using the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 读取器读取 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: The session security token that was read, an instance of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 读取的会话安全令牌，<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The reader must be positioned at either a WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or a WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` element.
trans-unit.target: 读取器必须定位在 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 或 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3`<wsc:SecurityContextToken>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method using a default token resolver.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用默认的标记解析程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The reader is not positioned at a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> or the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> cannot be read.
trans-unit.target: 读取器不放置在 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 无法读取。

trans-unit.source: The stream of bytes that contains the token.
trans-unit.target: 包含令牌的字节流。

trans-unit.source: The token resolver to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的令牌解析器。

trans-unit.source: Reads the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> from a stream of bytes by using the specified token resolver.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的标记解析器从字节流读取 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> that was read.
trans-unit.target: 读取的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation creates an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> over the token and invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将创建<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>通过令牌并调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> over the incoming <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 上传入 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> that can used to resolve the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 可用来解决 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: Reads the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> using the specified XML reader and token resolver.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 读取器和标记解析程序读取 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: The session security token that was read, an instance of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 读取的会话安全令牌，<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The reader must be positioned at either a WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or a WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` element.
trans-unit.target: 读取器必须定位在 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 或 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3`<wsc:SecurityContextToken>`元素。

trans-unit.source: If the token material is cached, it is read from the token cache, which is an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果缓存的令牌材料，它从缓存中读取令牌，这是实例的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache>类。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the token material is read from the child element of the `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` element that is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieElementName%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieNamespace%2A> properties and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A> method is invoked to decode the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 否则，从子元素的读取令牌材料`<wsc:SecurityContextToken>`由指定的元素<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieElementName%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieNamespace%2A>属性和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A>方法调用来解码 cookie。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how session tokens are serialized into a `<SecurityContextToken` element, see the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何将会话令牌序列化为`<SecurityContextToken`元素，请参阅<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="tokenResolver" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tokenResolver" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The reader is not positioned at a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> or the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> cannot be read.
trans-unit.target: 读取器不放置在 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 无法读取。

trans-unit.source: The transforms to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的转换。

trans-unit.source: Sets the transforms that will be applied to cookies.
trans-unit.target: 设置要应用在 cookie 上的转换。

trans-unit.source: Sets the list of transforms returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置的转换由列表<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.Transforms%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Transforms will be applied in the order in which they appear in the list when encoding a cookie and in the reverse order when decoding a cookie.
trans-unit.target: 转换将应用它们出现在列表中编码 cookie 时并按相反的顺序解码 cookie 时的顺序。

trans-unit.source: If the `transforms` parameter is `null`, an exception will be thrown from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A> method when it is called to encode or decode the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 如果`transforms`参数是`null`，将从引发异常<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A>方法调用来进行编码或解码 cookie 时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the token lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标记生存期。

trans-unit.source: The token lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 标记生存期。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultLifetime" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, if the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element is specified in the configuration file, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A> property is initialized to the value of the `lifetime` attribute by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果[ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)在配置文件中，指定元素<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.TokenLifetime%2A>属性初始化为的值`lifetime`按属性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set a time span that is less than or equal to zero occurs.
trans-unit.target: 发生设置小于或等于零的时间范围的尝试。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the tokens that this handler processes.
trans-unit.target: 获取此处理程序处理的标记的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the transforms that will be applied to the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 获取要应用在 cookie 上的转换。

trans-unit.source: The list of transforms that will be applied to the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 要要应用在 cookie 上的转换列表。

trans-unit.source: The transforms are applied in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 转换应用于<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The token to be checked.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的标记。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the session associated with the specified token is still valid.
trans-unit.target: 确定与指定标记相关联的会话是否有效。

trans-unit.source: Validity is determined by checking the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom" /> and <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo" /> properties of the specified token.
trans-unit.target: 通过检查指定标记的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo" /> 确定有效性。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if the session is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果该会话不再有效，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The token is not valid if its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> property is set to a value that occurs later than <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>, or if its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A> property is set to a value that occurs earlier than <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 令牌不是有效如果其<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A>属性设置为一个值，便会比<xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>，或者，如果其<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo%2A>属性设置为一个值，则会发生早于<xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A> methods to validate the session.
trans-unit.target: 从调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A>方法以验证该会话。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityToken" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityToken" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> 属性为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom" /> property of the token is later than <see cref="P:System.DateTime.UtcNow" />.
trans-unit.target: 令牌的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidFrom" /> 属性迟于 <see cref="P:System.DateTime.UtcNow" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo" /> property of the token is earlier than <see cref="P:System.DateTime.UtcNow" />.
trans-unit.target: 该令牌的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ValidTo" /> 属性早于 <see cref="P:System.DateTime.UtcNow" />。

trans-unit.source: Validates a token and returns its claims.
trans-unit.target: 确认一个象征和后退它的要求。

trans-unit.source: The token to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的令牌。

trans-unit.source: Must be assignable from <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 必须为可从 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 中赋值的。

trans-unit.source: Validates the specified token and returns its claims.
trans-unit.target: 验证指定的令牌并返回其声明。

trans-unit.source: The identities that are contained in the token.
trans-unit.target: 令牌中包含的标识。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateSession%2A> method to validate the token.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateSession%2A>方法来验证令牌。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> is not assignable from <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> 无法从 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 赋值。

trans-unit.source: The token to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的令牌。

trans-unit.source: Must be assignable from <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 必须为可从 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 中赋值的。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the endpoint to which the token is scoped.
trans-unit.target: 限定标识范围的终点的标示符。

trans-unit.source: Validates the specified session token and returns its claims.
trans-unit.target: 验证指定的会话令牌并返回其声明。

trans-unit.source: The identities that are contained in the token.
trans-unit.target: 令牌中包含的标识。

trans-unit.source: Performs a check to make sure that the specified token is scoped for the specified endpoint ID and, if so, invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method; otherwise, throws a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>.
trans-unit.target: 执行检查，以确保指定的标记的作用域为指定的终结点 ID 并且，如果是这样，调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法; 否则，将引发<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>。

trans-unit.source: Session tokens that have an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A> property that is `null` or empty are considered to be globally scoped.
trans-unit.target: 会话的令牌，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A>属性都`null`或视为空全局划分作用域。

trans-unit.source: This presents a potential security risk.
trans-unit.target: 这会带来潜在的安全风险。

trans-unit.source: For this reason you should make sure that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A> property is set in your session tokens.
trans-unit.target: 因此你应确保<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A>属性设置在会话令牌中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="endpointId" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="endpointId" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> is not assignable from <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> 无法从 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 赋值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId" /> property of the specified token is not <see langword="null" /> or empty and its value is different than that specified by the <paramref name="endpointId" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 指定令牌的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId" /> 属性不为 <see langword="null" /> 或空并且其值不同于 <paramref name="endpointId" /> 参数指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Serializes a token.
trans-unit.target: 序列化标记。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation serializes the token into either a WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` element.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将令牌序列化到 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 或 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3`<wsc:SecurityContextToken>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The token to write.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的标记。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified token into a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 将指定令牌序列化为字节数组。

trans-unit.source: An encoded byte array.
trans-unit.target: 编码的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified token by creating and XML writer over a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> and invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的标记序列化为通过创建和 XML 编写器，通过<xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>和调用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: See that overload for more details.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅该重载，以更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sessiontoken" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sessiontoken" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The XML writer with which to serialize the token.
trans-unit.target: 用于序列化令牌的 XML 编写器。

trans-unit.source: The token to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的标记。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified token by using the specified XML writer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定 XML 编写器序列化指定令牌。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation serializes the specified token as either a WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `<wsc:SecurityContextToken>` element, depending on the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.SecureConversationVersion%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现序列化为指定的标记的 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 或 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3`<wsc:SecurityContextToken>`元素，具体取决于值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.SecureConversationVersion%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Id%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is serialized as the `Id` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Id%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性序列化为`Id`属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ContextId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is serialized as the `<Identifier>` child element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ContextId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性序列化为`<Identifier>`子元素。

trans-unit.source: If not `null` the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyGeneration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is serialized as an `<Instance>` element.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是`null`<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyGeneration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性序列化为`<Instance>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Finally, if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `false`, the entire token is serialized into binary array which is passed to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A> method to be encoded.
trans-unit.target: 最后，如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是`false`，整个令牌序列化到二进制数组传递给的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ApplyTransforms%2A>方法进行编码。

trans-unit.source: The encoded token is then written as a base64 encoded value to the element and namespace specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieElementName%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieNamespace%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 编码后的标记然后作为 base64 编码值写入到的元素和命名空间指定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieElementName%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.CookieNamespace%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `true`, the token is not serialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是`true`，令牌不序列化。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> is not assignable from <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> 无法从 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken" /> 赋值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.SecureConversationVersion" /> of the token specifies a version of WS-Secure Conversation that is not supported by the handler.
trans-unit.target: 令牌的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.SecureConversationVersion" /> 指定处理程序不支持的 WS 安全对话的版本。
